name: Ominous Traveler
originalText: When Ominous Traveler enters the battlefield, draft a card from Ominous Traveler's spellbook. That card perpetually gains "You may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast this spell" and "When you cast this spell, return a creature named Ominous Traveler you control to its owner's hand."

spellbook: Tovolar, Dire Overlord // Tovolar, the Midnight Scourge

text: When Ominous Traveler enters the battlefield, draft a card from Ominous Traveler's spellbook.
